Articles.Content:
I don't want to download another 2 GB of content, it's going to really fragment my hard drive ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

Does the patcher/rsync still work or are they forcing full downloads on our throats? I tried using the patcher, but it got stuck on downloading binaries for some reason (even though I already have them).
It wasn't earlier but Alex is on it, it may be fixed, have to try it to see ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
